articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Ananya Panday is single, says mom Bhavana amid Aditya Roy Kapur dating rumours - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Bhavana Pandey said that her daughter Ananya Panday is single. She also added that link-ups between actors were normal. | Bollywood
articles.content: Ananya Panday's mother Bhavana Pandey quashed dating rumours of the actor and shared that her daughter is single. She was rumoured to be dating actor Aditya Roy Kapur after they were seen hanging out… [+2131 chars]

articles.description: Let’s take a look at Pooja Hegde’s bewitchingly beautiful pictures…
articles.content: Pooja added a retro twist to her look with a pair of white gloves. The actress completed her look with a choker necklace and minimal makeup.
